## Project Summary
CSE Freshers Party 2025 invite website using Next.js 14+ with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.

## Completed Steps
1. ✅ Created project instructions file
2. ✅ Initialized Next.js project with TypeScript
3. ✅ Configured Tailwind CSS with custom theme
4. ✅ Created all core components (Navbar, Hero, Footer, etc.)
5. ✅ Built all content sections (About, Details, Timeline, etc.)
6. ✅ Implemented RSVP form with validation
7. ✅ Added animations and particle background
8. ✅ Created comprehensive README
9. ✅ Installed all dependencies

## Next Steps
1. Run development server: `npm run dev`
2. Update environment variables in `.env.local`
3. Add actual event images to `/public/gallery/`
4. Customize content as needed
5. Test all features and responsiveness
